Agarimoo.chat_message: §aYour Chumcap Bucket trembles, it's an Agarimoo.

Carrot King.chat_message: §aIs this even a fish? It's the Carrot King!

Rider of the Deep.chat_message: §aThe Rider of the Deep has emerged.

Sea Witch.chat_message: §aIt looks like you've disrupted the Sea Witch's brewing session. Watch out, she's furious!

Guardian Defender.chat_message: §aYou've discovered a Guardian Defender of the sea.

Deep Sea Protector.chat_message: §aYou have awoken the Deep Sea Protector, prepare for a battle!

Water Hydra.chat_message: §aThe Water Hydra has come to test your strength.

The Sea Emperor.chat_message: §aThe Loch Emperor arises from the depths.

Frozen Steve.chat_message: §aFrozen Steve fell into the pond long ago, never to resurface...until now!

Nutcracker.chat_message: §aYou found a forgotten Nutcracker laying beneath the ice.

Nightmare.chat_message: §aYou hear trotting from beneath the waves, you caught a Nightmare.

Werewolf.chat_message: §aIt must be a full moon, a Werewolf appears.

Phantom Fisher.chat_message: §aThe spirit of a long lost Phantom Fisher has come to haunt you.

Grim Reaper.chat_message: §aThis can't be! The manifestation of death himself!

Nurse Shark.chat_message: §aA tiny fin emerges from the water, you've caught a Nurse Shark.

Blue Shark.chat_message: §aYou spot a fin as blue as the water it came from, it's a Blue Shark.

Tiger Shark.chat_message: §aA striped beast bounds from the depths, the wild Tiger Shark!

Great White Shark.chat_message: §aHide no longer, a Great White Shark has tracked your scent and thirsts for your blood!

Oasis Sheep.chat_message: §aAn Oasis Sheep appears from the water.

Oasis Rabbit.chat_message: §aAn Oasis Rabbit appears from the water.

Small Mithril Grubber.chat_message: §aA leech of the mines surfaces... you've caught a Mithril Grubber.

Medium Mithril Grubber.chat_message: §aA leech of the mines surfaces... you've caught a Medium Mithril Grubber.

Large Mithril Grubber.chat_message: §aA leech of the mines surfaces... you've caught a Large Mithril Grubber.

Bloated Mithril Grubber.chat_message: §aA leech of the mines surfaces... you've caught a Bloated Mithril Grubber.

Lava Blaze.chat_message: §aA Lava Blaze has surfaced from the depths!

Lava Pigman.chat_message: §aA Lava Pigman arose from the depths!

Flaming Worm.chat_message: §aA Flaming Worm surfaces from the depths!

Abyssal Miner.chat_message: §aAn Abyssal Miner breaks out of the water!

Moogma.chat_message: §aYou hear a faint Moo from the lava... A Moogma appears.

Magma Slug.chat_message: §aFrom beneath the lava appears a Magma Slug.

Pyroclastic Worm.chat_message: §aYou feel the heat radiating as a Pyroclastic Worm surfaces.

Lava Flame.chat_message: §aA Lava Flame flies out from beneath the lava.

Fire Eel.chat_message: §aA Fire Eel slithers out from the depths.

Lava Leech.chat_message: §aA small but fearsome Lava Leech emerges.

Thunder.chat_message: §c§lYou hear a massive rumble as Thunder emerges.

Lord Jawbus.chat_message: §c§lYou have angered a legendary creature... Lord Jawbus has arrived.

Trash Gobbler.chat_message: §aThe Trash Gobbler is hungry for you!

Banshee.chat_message: §aThe desolate wail of a Banshee breaks the silence.

Alligator.chat_message: §aA long snout breaks the surface of the water. It's an Alligator!

Dumpster Diver.chat_message: §aA Dumpster Diver has emerged from the swamp!

Bayou Sludge.chat_message: §aA swampy mass of slime emerges, the Bayou Sludge!

Titanoboa.chat_message: §a§r§c§lA massive Titanoboa surfaces. Its body stretches as far as the eye can see.

Ragnarok.chat_message: §c§r§c§lThe sky darkens and the air thickens. The end times are upon us: Ragnarok is here.

Fried Chicken.chat_message: §aSmells of burning. Must be a Fried Chicken.

Fiery Scuttler.chat_message: §cA Fiery Scuttler inconspicuously waddles up to you, friends in tow.

Wiki Tiki.chat_message: §c§r§c§lThe water bubbles and froths. A massive form emerges- you have disturbed the Wiki Tiki! You shall pay the price.

Blue Ringed Octopus.chat_message: §aA garish set of tentacles arise. It's a Blue Ringed Octopus!

Snapping Turtle.chat_message: §aA Snapping Turtle is coming your way, and it's ANGRY!

Frog Man.chat_message: §aIs it a frog? Is it a man? Well, yes, sorta, IT'S FROG MAN!!!!!!

Ent.chat_message: §aYou've hooked an Ent, as ancient as the forest itself.
